entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 03 March 2023
